hero.title: Our Projects
hero.subtitle: Portfolio of Excellence
hero.description: Explore our diverse portfolio of successfully delivered industrial and commercial projects across India.

projects.title: Helious Specialty Gases
projects.description: Helios Specialty Gases Pvt. Ltd is an industrial and specialty gases importer, manufacturer, and distributor in India. Deals into Pure gases, Rare Gases, Helium, Calibration Gas Standards, Specialty Gases, Hydrocarbons, Gas Cylinders, Gas Regulators, and Gas Handling Equipment sourced from globally renowned companies.
projects.shortDescription: Industrial gas manufacturing facility with specialized infrastructure for gas processing and storage.

testimonial.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonial.content: Adroit Grow delivered our facility ahead of schedule with exceptional attention to safety requirements.

projects.title: Helious Specialty Gases Pvt. Ltd.
projects.description: Helious Specialty Gases Pvt. Ltd. is an industrial and specialty gases importer, manufacturer, and distributor in India. Deals into Pure gases, Rare Gases, Helium, Calibration Gas Standards, Specialty Gases, Hydrocarbons, Gas Cylinders, Gas Regulators, and Gas Handling Equipment sourced from globally renowned companies.
projects.shortDescription: Regional expansion facility for specialty gas manufacturing and distribution.

projects.title: Unique Bimetal Industries
projects.description: Unique Bimetals is a professional Manufacturer & Supplier of different metal powder in different particle sizes. We offer a wide array of Bi-Metal Strips and Copper Alloy Powder for different applications.
projects.shortDescription: Professional Manufacturer & Supplier of metal powder and Bi-Metal Strips.

projects.title: Grind Tech Engines Pvt Ltd
projects.description: Grind Tech Engines Pvt Ltd is a certified manufacturer of high performance engine parts in India with a strong presence in the international market. They manufacture Liner and Sleeves, Piston, Piston Rings, Piston Pins, Cylinder Blocks, Engine Valves, Valves Seat Inserts, Valves Guide, Bimetallic Bushes and Bearing. This Company supplies to various Automobile and Industrial Companies in the European Market, the US Market & the Asian Market.
projects.shortDescription: Certified manufacturer of high performance engine parts with global presence.

projects.title: Ample Auto Tech Pvt Ltd
projects.description: Ample Auto Tech Pvt Ltd is a leading Manufacturer and Exporter of Steering & Suspension Parts in India. Their products are applicable to all segments of the automobile industry ranging from commercial vehicles, heavy duty vehicles, passenger vehicles, agricultural vehicles etc.
projects.shortDescription: Leading Manufacturer and Exporter of Steering & Suspension Parts in India.

testimonial.name: Priya Sharma
testimonial.content: Working with Adroit Grow was a seamless experience. They understood our automotive requirements perfectly.

projects.title: Ajay Air Products
projects.description: Ajay Air is a leading industrial and specialty gas importer, manufacturer, and distributor in India. Deals in Pure gases, Rare Gases, Calibration Gas Standards, Specialty Gases, Hydrocarbons, Bulk Cryogenic Liquids, Gas Cylinders, Gas Regulators and Gas Handling Equipment sourced from globally renowned companies.
projects.shortDescription: Leading industrial and specialty gas manufacturer and distributor in India.

projects.title: JMD Scientific Equipment Pvt Ltd
projects.description: JMD Scientific Equipment Pvt Ltd is headquartered in Gurgaon, Haryana and is a leading manufacturer, supplier and exporter of Physics, Chemistry and General Lab Equipment. Having fully equipped Tool Room for making all types of Sheet metal and Plastic tools with Injection molding facility.
projects.shortDescription: Leading manufacturer of Physics, Chemistry and General Lab Equipment.

projects.title: DLF Corporate Green
projects.description: Premium corporate office interior design and execution for a leading enterprise at DLF Corporate Green. The project showcased modern workspace design with focus on employee well-being.
projects.shortDescription: Premium corporate office interior with modern workspace design elements.

projects.title: Olympus Corporate Interior
projects.description: Corporate office interior for Olympus reflecting the brand's values of precision and innovation. The design incorporated Japanese design principles with modern functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Corporate interior reflecting brand values of precision and innovation.

projects.title: Sonepar Office Interior
projects.description: Office interior fitout for Sonepar, a global leader in electrical distribution. The design focused on creating a collaborative work environment with flexible spaces.
projects.shortDescription: Collaborative workspace design with flexible work areas and modern amenities.

projects.title: Star Specialty Gases
projects.description: Design-build project for specialty gas manufacturing and storage facility. The project emphasized safety systems and compliance with hazardous material handling regulations.
projects.shortDescription: Specialty gas facility with advanced safety systems and regulatory compliance.
